ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:20:41 [Issue ID 4000-130295] urn:comicvine:4000-130295 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 23:53:03. [Issue ID 165319]
ComicInfo.Summary:
This month’s item is a night of hard drinking with the Bush girls.
A cynical look at entrepreneurs, buzz, job interviews, justice, health clubs, housecleaning, weddings, friendship, relationships, therapy, attachments, assignments, efficiency, restaurants, exercise, beliefs, and the office.

ComicInfo.Title: 8: Mild; You’re an Official Over-the-Top, Card-Carrying, No-Life, Whack-Job NASCAR Fanatic if…; Mad's Ecchbay Item of the Month; The Lighter Side of…; Pleasant Little Thoughts that Might Help You Sleep Better at Night; Monroe and… the Medieval Faire; Are You a Terminal Slacker?; Duke Bissell’s Tales of Undisputed Interest; A Mad Look at Spring Break; Pre-nuptial Agreement of Jennifer Lopez and Ben Affleck; Mad’s Proposed Rule Changes for the Upcoming NASCAR Season
